title: Create Variables
text: We are looking to find the measure of two angles. Let $$x=measure$$ of larger angle and $$y=measure$$ of smaller angle.

title: Translate to a System of Equations
text: The two angles are supplementary, translating into $$x+y=180$$. The larger angle is twelve degrees less than five times the smaller angle, translating into $$x=5y-12$$.

title: Solve the System
text: Using substitution we can substitute $$x=5y-12$$ into $$x+y=180$$ to solve for y, the smaller angle. $$x+y=180$$ $$5y-12+y=180$$ $$6y-12=180$$ $$6y=192$$

title: Finding Smaller Angle
text: What is the measure of angle y?

title: Finding Larger Angle
text: Given $$y=12$$, plug the known value into $$x=5y-12$$ to solve for x. What is x?
